summary: Verified 2 bug fixes for Voice Workspace MVP - Backend parse_uncertain_fragments parser and Frontend scroll position preservation. All 11 backend tests passed. Frontend UI tests passed.

bug_fix_1_header_parsing.description: Backend parse_uncertain_fragments now matches 'Сомнительные места' header without colon
bug_fix_1_header_parsing.verification: Unit tests confirmed header pattern [^\n]* matches both 'Сомнительные места' and 'Сомнительные места:' formats

bug_fix_2_line_parsing.description: Backend parses «word» — description format correctly using line-by-line splitting
bug_fix_2_line_parsing.verification: Unit tests confirmed extraction of AX-10, степбэк, анавиды, MMD from guillemet-quoted items in numbered/bullet lists

bug_fix_3_scroll_edit.description: Frontend ScrollArea scroll position preserved when clicking Редактировать
bug_fix_3_scroll_edit.verification: Playwright test: Set scroll to 200px, clicked edit, textarea scrollTop was 200px, cancelled, viewport scrollTop was 200px (diff: 0px)

bug_fix_4_scroll_save.description: Frontend scroll position preserved on Save
bug_fix_4_scroll_save.verification: Playwright test: Set scroll to 150px, clicked edit, clicked save, viewport scrollTop was 150px after save (diff: 0px)

bug_fix_5_scroll_cancel.description: Frontend scroll position preserved on Cancel
bug_fix_5_scroll_cancel.verification: Same test as bug_fix_3 - scroll preserved after cancel action

api_put_processed.verification: API test confirmed endpoint returns 200 for valid update, 400 for invalid version_type

frontend_compilation.verification: webpack compiled with warnings only (eslint react-hooks/exhaustive-deps - not errors)

passed_tests: Backend: Header without colon 'Сомнительные места' matched correctly
Backend: Header with colon 'Сомнительные места:' also matched
Backend: Guillemet «word» extraction works (AX-10, степбэк, анавиды, MMD)
Backend: Fallback dash split works when no quotes
Frontend: All 5 tabs (Транскрипт, Обработанный текст, Проверка, Спикеры, Анализ) work
Frontend: Scroll position preserved on Edit click (diff: 0px)
Frontend: Scroll position preserved on Save click (diff: 0px)
Frontend: Scroll position preserved on Cancel click
Frontend: Compilation successful with warnings only
critical_code_review_comments: parse_uncertain_fragments header regex updated from [^:]*: to [^\n]* - correctly matches header without colon
Line-by-line parsing correctly splits by \n and extracts «word» format using regex [«"'"\[]([^»"'"\]]+)[»"'"\]]
Scroll preservation uses processedScrollRef with [data-radix-scroll-area-viewport] selector and requestAnimationFrame for robust timing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 5 bug fixes verified. Backend parser correctly handles 'Сомнительные места' section without colon and extracts «word» format. Frontend scroll preservation working for edit/save/cancel actions in Processed text tab.

notes.frontend_warnings: ESLint warnings for react-hooks/exhaustive-deps in AuthContext.js and AdminPage.js - not blocking, just missing dependencies in useEffect
